Description:
Model
Brand: SAMSUNG
Series: 870 EVO Series
Model: MZ-77E500B/AM
Part Number: MZ-77E500B/AM
Device Type: Internal Solid State Drive (SSD)
Used For: Consumer


Details
Form Factor: 2.5"
Capacity: 500GB
Memory Components: V-NAND
Interface: SATA III
Cache: Samsung 512MB Low Power DDR4 SDRAM
Encryption: Class 0 (AES 256) TCG/Opal v2.0, MS eDrive (IEEE1667)


Performance
Max Sequential Read: Up to 560 MBps
Max Sequential Write: Up to 530 MBps
MTBF: 1,500,000 hours


Features
Features: THE SSD ALL-STAR - The latest 870 EVO has indisputable performance, reliability and compatibility built upon Samsung's pioneering technology.

EXCELLENCE IN PERFORMANCE - Enjoy professional-level SSD performance with 870 EVO, which maximizes the SATA interface limit to 560/530 MB/s sequential speeds, accelerates write speeds and maintains long-term high performance with a larger variable buffer.

INDUSTRY-DEFINING RELIABILITY - Meet the demands of every task - from everyday computing to 8K video processing, with up to 300 TBW.

MORE COMPATIBLE THAN EVER - 870 EVO has been compatibility tested for major host systems and applications, including chipsets, motherboards, NAS, and video recording devices.

UPGRADE WITH EASE - Simply plug 870 EVO into the standard 2.5-inch SATA form factor on your desktop PC or laptop and let the renewed migration software takes care of the rest.

SAMSUNG MAGICIAN SOFTWARE - Make your drive work smoothly with enhanced Samsung Magician 6 software that helps you easily manage your drive, keep up with the latest updates, monitor the drive's health and status, or even enhance its performance.


Environmental
Power Consumption (Idle): Max. 30 mW
Power Consumption (Active): Average: 2.2W
Maximum: 3.5W
Max Shock Resistance: 1500G


Dimensions & Weight
Height: 7.00mm
Width: 69.85mm
Depth: 100.00mm
Weight: 86.18g
Label: SSD 2.5 Samsung 870 EVO 500GB
